short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Designed to nudge and motivate you into focus, this extension gives you pomodoro timer and upcoming tasks on every tab.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This is a companion extension for Pomorace.com. This extension modifies every website you visit to create a movable card on top of the website loaded. The movable card will provide you with the following:

1. Pomodoro timer (start/ stop the focus timer directly from the page you are on instead of going to Pomorace.com)
2. Upcoming tasks (see all upcoming tasks here and complete them directly from the page you are on instead of going to Pomorace.com)
3. Pomorace users who are focusing right now (see who else is focusing via Pomorace at any given moment)
4. Optional motivational videos to motivate yourself while you are not focusing!
